name: TransportationInsecurityGoalsSNOMEDCT
title: Transportation Insecurity Goals SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the goals associated with transportation insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of this SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT goals that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Feels transportation time to destination is acceptable (finding)
Able to afford transportation related expense (finding)
Has transportation that meets individual's cognitive needs (finding)
Has transportation that meets individual's functional needs (finding)
Has transportation to access community resources (finding)
Has transportation to access health care (finding)
